name: Bobbe's Super Cheesy Pasta
author: BOBBESONG
summary: A very rich, creamy, and zesty cheese and pasta recipe. Not for the dieters out there! The salad dressing adds a very nice creaminess and a little 'bite'!
ingredients: ½ cup cubed sharp Cheddar cheese
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil, and cook the rigatoni pasta 8 to 10 minutes, until al dente
Drain, and return pasta to the pot
In the pot with the pasta, mix the butter, garlic, Cheddar cheese, Gouda cheese, and Parmesan cheese
Cook and stir over low heat
Be careful not to have too much heat, as the cheese will get stringy
Gradually mix in the blue cheese dressing and milk
Continue to cook and stir until the pasta is well coated
Season with paprika, salt, and pepper
